title: Episode 217. “Are we broke…or just bad with money? (Part 1)
description: Dominique (33) and Chris (34) have been together for six years, engaged for two, and share a two-year-old son. While Dominique manages parenting, full-time work, and their finances, Chris shuts down when money comes up—and has no plan for what’s next. With rising childcare costs, growing debt, and a second home draining up to $2,000/month, […] The post Episode 217. “Are we broke…or just bad with money? (Part 1) first appeared on I Will Teach You To Be Rich. Source
author: Ramit Sethi
